ovdesc.p: Parameter file to specify Bulk Upload type.

Contains parameter information for each type of Bulk – at present this is restricted to what FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION types should be used, and whether it is SINLGE or MULTI type. This will be attached to FT.BULK.MASTER

desc.p: Transaction type used to handle transfer funds from WASH account given in FT.BULK.MASTER to NON T24’s PASSIVE account given in FT.BULK.ITEM
Used only for CREDIT processing
Transaction type given here will be overridden when FT.BLK.IT.TRANSACTION.TYPE is provided at FT.BULK.ITEM level
Mandatory for SINGLE
Should be a Valid record in FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION
Number of Working or Calendar days to be added with Today is given here. This will be defaulted in FT.BULK.MASTER’s PROCESSING.DATE field.
This value can be overridden at Bulk Master Level
Values like 1C, 2W, etc are allowed
Mandatory Input
Holds the mode of transfer to be used in the payment process
Reserved for Future Use
Transaction type used to handle transfer funds from WASH account given in FT.BULK.MASTER to T24’s PASSIVE account given in FT.BULK.ITEM
Used only for CREDIT processing
Transaction type given here will be overridden when FT.BLK.IT.TRANSACTION.TYPE is provided at FT.BULK.ITEM level
Mandatory for SINGLE type
Should be a Valid record in FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION
Holds Transaction type used to handle transfer funds between ACTIVE and WASH account
Used for both DEBIT and CREDIT processing
Mandatory for SINGLE type
Should be a Valid record in FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION
Free text field, which hold the information about bulk update type
Mandatory field
Text upto 35 characters of type A can be given
Mode of Bulk update type is given.
SINGLE :
CREDIT - Initially funds are transferred from Active account to Wash account. And then each Passive account given in FT.BULK.ITEM is credited from the Wash account
DEBIT – Initially funds are transferred from each Passive account given in FT.BULK.ITEM to Wash account. And then Active account in FT.BULK.MASTER is credited from Wash account
MULTI :
CREDIT - Every time Passive account given in FT.BULK.ITEM is credited from the Active account
DEBIT - Every time Active account is credited from the Passive account given in FT.BULK.ITEM
The value given in this field can be overridden at Bulk Master Level
Mandatory Input
Only SINGLE or MULTI is allowed
Transaction type used to handle transfer funds from ACTIVE account given in FT.BULK.MASTER to NON T24’s PASSIVE account given in FT.BULK.ITEM
Transaction type given here will be overridden when FT.BLK.IT.TRANSACTION.TYPE is provided at FT.BULK.ITEM level
Mandatory for MULTI
Should be a Valid record in FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION
This field holds the Transaction type used to handle transfer funds from ACTIVE account given in FT.BULK.MASTER to T24’s PASSIVE account given in FT.BULK.ITEM
Used only for CREDIT processing
Transaction type given here will be overridden when FT.BLK.IT.TRANSACTION.TYPE is provided at FT.BULK.ITEM level
Mandatory for MULTI
Should be a Valid record in FT.TXN.TYPE.CONDITION
Name of Bulk Update type.
Alphanumeric characters are allowed. Id should be meaningful, so that it reflects the mode of bulk process (SINGLE or MULTI)
A valid DD.PARAMETER id is given for DIRECT.DEBIT processing.
Not mandatory.
A version of Application, which will be used to do payment through OFS in Payment process
Currently restricted to use FT version for Credit upload processing.
Mandatory Input
Valid record in VERSION
The number of calendar days after which the processed or rejected bulk master with all bulk items processed/rejected will be moved to history
Not mandatory.
Any numeric numbers is allowed
